title: Secretary Of Defense Nominee Appears Headed For Easy Confirmation
teaser: Theoretical physicist and former high-ranking Pentagon insider Ashton Carter is fully expected to be the next Secretary of Defense. His confirmation hearing before the Senate Armed Services Committee is less about him and more about President Obama's defense record, which Republicans consider feckless.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
